title: Bug 34739Keys preference page table column not sized correctly
description: Bug 34739Keys preference page table column not sized correctly
OB: Column 0 has the samesize as on Windows and appears to be empty anyway. However, the contents ofcolumn 1 and 2 is not readable. I also cannot resize the columns.On Windows the columns are sized properly and I can resize them.
